value:
$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Ur...rrgh...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|...cess Reginn! Princess Reginn!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Hmm?$k$p$EFace_Pain|...Wh-where are we?!
What happened?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|We're at the Emblian imperial villa.
You were struck unconscious and
have been asleep for days...$k$p$EFace|I'm so happy to see you awake!
I was so worried about you!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|I-I'm sorry. I feel all right now!$k$p$EFace_Pain|Wait—I've been asleep?! I have to
go after my brothers!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No, wait, Princess Reginn! You still
need to rest. You shouldn't be up
and moving yet!$k$pBesides, my brother and the others
are following up on what your
brothers are doing!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Ah! We've just returned! ...I see
Princess Reginn has returned to
us as well.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh! Welcome back!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Can you tell me anything about
the situation with Niðavellir, or
my brothers?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|The truth is...we have no answers yet.$k$pBut when you feel up to it, I do hope
you will join us as we venture back
into Niðavellir.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Niðavellir...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*gasp*$k$pWh-what happened here?$k$pThe capital is a smoking ruin!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|There are bodies everywhere...
H-how awful!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Is that you...Princess Reginn?
H-have you returned?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes, I'm here. Can you tell me
what happened?$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|It was...a monster. A ghastly thing
I've never seen before in all my
life attacked as if from nowhere...$k$pPlease... Princess Reginn...
You must...save Niðavellir.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|H-hey! Stay with me!$k$p...Stay with me!$k$p$EFace_Pain2|...$k$pI don't understand. Who could have
done such a terr—$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|GRAAAGHH!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What is that?!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Normal,Face|RRRAAAAHHH!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|The monster—it's back!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It could destroy all of Niðavellir!
Not even the capital was safe...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait... Brother? That...
That's Fáfnir!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?! How is that possible?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What happened to you, Fáfnir?
Brother, please!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait—don't get too close, Princess
Reginn! He's dangerous!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no! Princess Reginn!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Normal,Face|Unngh...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Fáfnir! Get a hold of yourself!
It's me, Reginn—your sister!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Normal,Face|Re...ginn?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|GET AWAY FROM HIM!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ó-Ótr?!$k$p$Sbs150|
